gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.CmdLineSyntax

Class Option

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.CmdLineSyntax.Option

  • public class Option
extends java.lang.Object
    The class Option represents an object of a command line system. The options of a command line system can be represented in 3 formats:
    1. A linked list (OptionList)
    2. An option syntaxed String
    3. A vector (Array) of OptionItems

    History:

    • SCR-11, chlu, 06-04-12, Fixed compile error due to JDK upgrade
    Version:
    V-2013
    Author:
    NLM NLS Development Team
